title: SL rupee hits Rs. 275 against US Dollar at several banks
body_lines: The Sri Lankan rupee hits a record low of 275 against the US Dollar.
According to the exchange rates of several licensed Commercial Banks, the buying rate is at 275 while the buying rate is at around Rs. 265 per USD.
However, according to the Central bank of Sri Lanka, the selling rate is at 269 while buying rate is at 259.
